Bernie Sanders was not the only one looking to raise money in the wake of the shootings. On Monday, the Tea Party Express sent an e-mail to its members asking for contributions.

a former Reagan administration aide who started a campaign to draft Mike Pence for the GOP presidential nomination. Marjorie Dannenfelser , president of the Susan B. Anthony List, a group that opposes abortion, said she trusts that Mike Pence has come to the place that's right for him and his family. `` What I most want is for him to have a long future,'' Marjorie Dannenfelser said.`` So I'm sure that he's made a discernment that this is the right move.''

Mr Eric Schmidt had been brought in to provide greater management experience to Google. He has been in the job for a decade and will become executive chairman. Google said Mr Eric Schmidt would focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships . The BBC reports the announcement was made as Google unveiled strong net profits in the last three months of$ US2.54 billion on revenues of$ US8.44 billion. The$ US2.54

Philadelphia has alternated wins and losses in its last six games after losing nine of 10. The Sixers, who opened the season 10-0 at the First Union Center, are 1-7 in their last eight home games. This is not the team we thought we were going to have, Sixers coach Larry Bird Courtney Lee said, referring to injuries that have hampered the team. Philadelphia, which trailed by 18 in the second quarter, closed to 50-47 following a three-point play by Allen Iverson early in the third.

Bernie Sanders suggested the bigger battle would likely occur in Vermont.`` There is no question in my mind the Vermont Legislature is going to see an assault from the insurance industry,'' he said. There will be enormous pressure on the governor and Legislature not to go forward. James Haslam , director of the Vermont Workers Center which coordinated the Health Care is a Human Right Campaign, welcomed the political partnership on display Tuesday as more evidence of the increasing momentum for health care reform.

at Mr. Colin Powell 's contention that he was misled by faulty intelligence into making the public case for the invasion of Iraq.`` Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody,'' Mr. Donald Rumsfeld writes. Nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The president did not lie. The vice president did not lie.[ CIA Director President Bush ] Tenet did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did not lie. I did not lie.... The far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. Even so, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld -- who does reveal that former President Bush asked for Iraq invasion plans within days of 9/11-- argues that removing Saddam Hussein was the right thing to do.
